name: Eustass"Captain"Kid (001)
effect: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] (3) (You may rest the specified number of DON!! cards in your cost area.) You may trash 1 card from your hand: Set this Leader as active.

name: Urouge
effect: [DON!! x1] If you have 3 or more Characters, this card gains +2000 power.

name: Capone"Gang"Bege
effect: [Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)

name: Killer
effect:
[On Play] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's rested Characters with a cost of 3 or less.
[Trigger] Play this card.
Disclaimer: This card has been re-printed with new errata'd text as part of the Revision Pack cards series. This product page is for the original, pre-errata print of this card.

name: Jewelry Bonney
effect:
[Activate: Main] (1) (You may rest the specified number of DON!! cards in your cost area.) You may rest this Character: Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 "Supernovas" type card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
Disclaimer: This card has been re-printed with new errata'd text as part of the Revision Pack cards series. This product page is for the original, pre-errata print of this card.

name: Scratchmen Apoo
effect:
[DON!! x1] [When Attacking] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's DON!! cards.

name: Trafalgar Law
effect:
[On Play] Set up to 1 of your "Supernovas" or "Heart Pirates" type rested Characters with a cost of 5 or less as active.

name: Basil Hawkins
effect: [DON!! x1] [Once Per Turn] [Your Turn] If this Character battles your opponent's Character, set this card as active.

name: Eustass"Captain"Kid (013)
effect:
[Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)
[DON!! x1] [End of Your Turn] Set this card as active.

name: X.Drake
effect: [DON!! x1] [Your Turn] If this Character is rested, your "Supernovas" or "Navy" type Leaders and Characters gain +1000 power.

name: Scalpel
effect:
[Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +2000 power during this battle. Then, set up to 1 of your DON!! cards as active.
[Trigger] Set up to 2 of your DON!! cards as active.
Disclaimer: This card has been re-printed with new errata'd text as part of the Revision Pack cards series. This product page is for the original, pre-errata print of this card.

name: Repel
effect:

name: Straw Sword
effect:
[Main] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters.
[Trigger] Play up to 1 "Supernovas" type card with a cost of 2 or less from your hand.
